scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test&& npm run build && npm run db:up && jasmine && npm run db:reset && node config/finished.js
scripts.test:windows: node config/setup.js && set NODE_ENV=test&& npm run build && npm run db:up && jasmine && npm run db:reset && node config/finished.js
scripts.set:env: eb setenv AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID AWS_REGION=$AWS_REGION AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY JWT_TOKEN=$JWT_TOKEN PGHOST=$PGHOST PGPASSWORD=$PGPASSWORD PGPORT=$PGPORT PGUSER=$PGUSER PGDATABASE=$PGDATABASE PGTEST=$PGTEST PORT=$PORT PEPPER=$PEPPER NODE_ENV=$NODE_ENV HOST=$HOST AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION
scripts.build:zip: npm run clean && npx tsc && cp .npmrc www/.npmrc && cp package.json www/package.json && cp -R .elasticbeanstalk www/.elasticbeanstalk && cd www && zip -r Archive.zip . && cd ..
